title: net/http: TestServerValidatesHostHeader timeout
body:
TestServerValidatesHostHeader is occasionally timing out on the `<-conn.closec`. Here's a recent example from the builders: [2016-01-12T02:00:48-352e287/linux-amd64-race](https://build.golang.org/log/8c382d35fa67de8235ccb31aed0ebe92fbe482ed).

I've been able to reproduce this a few times myself by running `go test -short std` in a loop on the linux-amd64-nocgo builder. In case it's relevant, here's the full GOTRACEBACK=crash trace from a timeout:

```
SIGQUIT: quit
PC=0x45f8f1 m=0

goroutine 0 [idle]:
runtime.futex(0xbe18c8, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xbe0e70, 0x0, 0x0, 0x40e594, 0xbe18c8, ...)
```
